entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
